```{r read-manifest, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(bs4cards)

url <- "https://djnavarro.net/series-hush/"

images <- paste0(url, "manifest.csv") %>% 
  read_csv() %>% 
  filter(
    resolution %in% c(800, 2500), 
    format == "png"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(path = paste0(url, path)) %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = resolution, 
    names_prefix = "path_", 
    values_from = path
  ) 
```

```{r gallery, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
includes <- c(
  1126, 1130, 1157, 1199,
  1261, 1262, 1272, 1278
)

images %>%
  filter(img_id %in% includes) %>% 
  cards(
    image = path_800,
    link = path_2500,
    layout = "image-only", 
    border_radius = 0,
    border_width = 0, 
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )  
```
